Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:11#2003#Red Lash sentinels} have the area under constant surveillance, so we can't move through the grotto as we'd like to.

But if those sentinels disappear, we can get from the dock into most of the main passageways in the grotto.

That's your cue, . Take out those sentinels!
Now we can start probing the grotto interior in earnest. For the federation!
Take out those {@LinkCreature:11#2003#Red Lash sentinels}. They're the first rung on the ladder.
